attributes.action: Say  No to a second referendum on an in or out vote on the E. U.
attributes.additional_details: Remember what happened in Ireland when the public had to vote twice until it satisfied Europe . Of course there was time for more scaremongering  to get a vote which was not for the good of the Irish nation. They have lost a young  educated generation to Australia and the rest of the world.
attributes.background:
We should respect the election result even if there is disagreement on the outcome. 
Does it follow every election should have  a second or third  vote just because some people are not happy when we have the results.
